title: Massive frame-rate drop during fights?
body: Over the past couple of games I've played I've noticed that my frame-rate is dropping rather alarmingly low. Now my computer isn't exactly brand-new, but this seems like too major an issue to be attributed to hardware failures, especially since it seems to be a recent occurrence. I can get 110-120 fps just walking around/farming/etc but when it comes to team-fighting it drops all the way to about 30 (I know that's still not too terrible, but when you're used to much higher it can be very jarring and, more importantly, frustrating). Just wanted to post here to see if that's something that can be attributed to the game itself or if it's just my PC showing it's age.

replies.body: My first thought for these fps issues always goes to updating graphics drivers first, but also make sure that you've gone through the other steps listed in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a precaution. Those steps have been known to help with a good number of common fps issues so it's always good to start there.
Thanks for the suggestion. Ended up having to drop all the graphics settings to very low. Unfortunate, but at least everything is running better now.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lZv6E2Xz-update-on-fps-issues-in-722-and-723

Sadly, it's a known issue. Sometimes it becomes unplayable and it's getting REALLY annoying. Just wait until they find a proper fix.
